DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to establish the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and recommended Phase 2 dose (or dose range as appropriate) of BMS-907351 (XL184) when administered orally on a once daily schedule in subjects with advanced or metastatic solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study of BMS-907351 (XL184) in Patients With Solid Tumors in Japan
DOC.criteria: Advanced or metastatic solid tumors for whom the standard of care is ineffective or inappropriate Life expectancy of at least 3 months Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance 02 Subject has uncontrolled intercurrent illness
